question:
You work for an international company. You have seen an advertisement for a training course which will useful for your job.

Write a letter to your manager. In your letter
Describe the training course you want to do
Explain what the company could do to help you
Say how the course will be useful for your job
text: Good day to you. I am writing to inform you about a Project Management training course that I would  love to do. The program is about enhancing project deliverables and equipping individuals on how to manage and direct a project. I am bringing this to you, because this was part of our discussion during my last appraisal.

So, In order for me to partake in this training, I would need the approval of the company's HR manager before I can register for it. Also, I would need the company's letter-headed paper to file in my application. Moreover, the good thing is that we can get a discount if we have more than five people registering for this same course.
Furthermore, I have gone through the curriculum of the training and I can see that after the program, I should be able to handle delicate and high-level tasks for our unit.
Finally, I do hope you can kindly consider this request with high priority. Thank you and have a wonderful day.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you have an unnecessary comma before the dependent clause marker because. Consider removing the comma.
